import React, { Component } from 'react' import EventService from '../../../service/event.service' import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class EventDetails extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { event: [] } this.eventService = new EventService() } componentDidMount = () => { const event_id = this.props.match.params.event_id this.eventService .getBook(event_id) .then(res => this.setState({ event: res.data })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } deleteEvent = () => { const event_id = this.props.match.params.event_id this.bookService .deleteEvent(event_id) .then(res => this.props.history.push('/eventos')) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return ( <>

{this.state.event.name}

Detalles

{this.state.book.name}

Descripci√≥n: {this.state.event.description}

Volver ) } } export default EventDetails
